verses.verse: <S%H4100>Why<s%> are the <S%H1471>nations<s%> in an <S%H7283>uproar,<s%> And the <S%H3816>peoples<s%> <S%H1897>devising<s%> a <S%H7385>vain<s%> <S%H7385>thing<s%>?

The <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H3320>take<s%> their <S%H3320>stand,<s%> And the <S%H7336>rulers<s%> <S%H3245>take<s%> <S%H3245>counsel<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> <S%H5921>Against<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> His Anointed: <S%H4899><s%>
"Let us <S%H5423>tear<s%> their <S%H4147>fetters<s%> <S%H5423>apart,<s%> And <S%H7993>cast<s%> <S%H7993>away<s%> their <S%H5688>cords<s%> from us!"
He who <S%H3427>sits<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H7832>laughs,<s%> The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3932>scoffs<s%> at them.
<S%H227>Then<s%> He will <S%H1696>speak<s%> to them in His <S%H639>anger<s%> And <S%H926>terrify<s%> them in His fury: <S%H2740><s%>
"But as for Me, I have <S%H9332>installed<s%> My <S%H4428>King<s%> Upon <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> My <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>"

"I will <S%H3588>surely<s%> <S%H5608>tell<s%> of the <S%H2706>decree<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord:<s%> He <S%H559>said<s%> to Me, 'Thou art My <S%H1121>Son,<s%> <S%H3117>Today<s%> I have <S%H3205>begotten<s%> Thee.

<S%H7592>'Ask<s%> of Me, and I will surely <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> as Thine <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> And the [very] <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> as Thy <S%H272>possession.<s%>
'Thou shalt <S%H9570>break<s%> them with a <S%H7626>rod<s%> of <S%H1270>iron,<s%> Thou shalt <S%H5310>shatter<s%> them like <S%H3627>earthenware.<s%> <S%H3335><s%>' "

<S%H5401>Do<s%> <S%H5401>homage<s%> to the <S%H1248>Son,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> He <S%H599>become<s%> <S%H599>angry,<s%> and you perish [in] the <S%H6>way,<s%> For His <S%H1870>wrath<s%> may <S%H639>soon<s%> be <S%H4592>kindled.<s%> How <S%H1197>blessed<s%> are <S%H835>all<s%> who <S%H3605>take<s%> <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in Him!
